text:
Hello, I got some problems with the Preview of my templates. On 1 account all the preview works but now I moved the theme to a different account and now I see "No preview available" What could cause this?

When I click on preview template I also just see everything fine. Only when I need to select the template I am not seeing anything

Are you looking at the right portal, the one where you actually created the template? I was trying hard once just like you, just to realize at the end that I had several portals opened in different tabs and I was searching in the wrong one :joy: :see_no_evil:
Jokes aside, does your template have the line _isAvailableForNewContent: true_? And a proper label?
Yes. So I created the Theme with themplates on a different portal and copyd the theme over to a different one. But now I dont see the preview only if I click on show preview.

Hello,
I need to add a fields.json file to my theme but I can't find how to do that without HS CLI (I don't have rights to do it)
Can you help me please? Thanks

Good morning!
Is there a way to add the email from the person that submitted the form to the redirect url?
essentially, I want the thank-you page to be something like <http://www.samplepage.com/thank-you?email={{contact.email}}|www.samplepage.com/thank-you?email={{contact.email}}>
I’ve been struggling with this for some time now and cant find a solution.
I tried some javascript way and it works in normal windows but in incognito it wont…

Hi All, support send me here.

I am having issues with my HubSpot app. Client is reporting to see app in Spanish when searching google. But I only configured English Store app. How can I make sure that we only have English version?

I double check and we only have english version, but clients are seeing other languages...

Hi Guys, the support send me here :slightly_smiling_face:
I’m currently struggling with failing builds of my HubSpot app. I can trigger new builds via push to the HubSpot connected repository but I only get in the build view that isn’t helping me to fix this issue.
** Encountered an error starting this build. If this continues in future commits, please contact HubSpot**
Is there a way to get more details on this?

finally this could be resolved be removing the github connection to be able to upload the project manually. When uploading the project manually i got a message pointing me to a wrong configured json property inside my app.json
Someone already used rudderstack to track event and made an integration in javascript ? I can’t send an identify event on HubSpot form submission. Any Idea ?

Yeah I mean from a privacy standpoint it probably isn't great. ChatSpot (gpt3.5 x HubSpot) is a much better option because  it handles all the privacy stuff for you. 2 options for using GPT models with better privacy:
Use the api playground (by default it won't share conversation history with openai)
Toggle the chat history off in the chat settings box on chatgpt
also the <#C0558GU8H2M|ai> channel is a great place to talk about this type of stuff
Through HubSpot not really but you could possibly set it up at the DNS level. Where did you buy your domain?
will try this.. crossing my fingers

oh that's interesting, and you didn't setup any other languages under the localization settings? <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/listing-your-app#create-and-update-a-localized-listing-for-an-existing-app-listing>
It's possible that HubSpot is automatically translating the title
I just looked it up using <http://google.es|google.es> and found the same thing
Actually it doesn't pop up under normal google:
Just the video does
Interesting, for visibility purposes: <@U03FJQPSC0Y>
for these types of things you definitely want to put it in the <#C04A3FUK8HK|crm-development-beta> channel that's where all the crm project nerds hang out
hmm for some reasons is redirecting me to a whole different page…
Yeah that's what it should be doing
What were you expecting to happen?
im sorry haha i meant to a whole different page rather than the one im setting for the redirectUrl
oh yeah that's probably becuase you set up the redirect on the form settings
you'll need to turn that one off
you are right. how can i turn it off or make sure it is overriden by the code you shared? or the one is selected from the editor settings
Well you can't really override the one in the settings, you just have to make sure one isn't setup
makes sense. let me give it a try
you sir are the real MVP
haha thanks bro
I'll wear that compliment like a badge
i’ll give it a couple more tests but i think you just saved my day/week/month
hahah Hero Carter McKay
NP!

Thanks Carter, Christian, you will get faster response inside <#C04A3FUK8HK|crm-development-beta> channel, however since I already saw this, I'm going to take this up internally and see what went wrong.

I’m trying to run an A/B test, but only seeing one variation of the page (confirmed, both variations are Published in HubSpot). Anyone have any idea how to fix / why it might be happening? A/B test pages can each use a different template, right?
<@U05BPKGBB40> can you DM your account ID?

Hello. I have a question regarding HubSpot API but haven't been able to get the answers through HubSpot support or documentation. In our CRM, we have tasks created for every company record and i want to process them via API (for  task prioritization ) . I am able to get the tasks that i want but however i am not able to access the company object it is associated to. In UI, the tasks have an association with a company. How do i access them via API ?
It seems to have something to do with our reverse proxy setup, but not sure why or how to fix.
Hi. How difficult is it for a blog search module to search full blog posts, instead of just titles and excerpts please? Has anyone here managed to achieve this?
yes, I did not setup any languages besides english. A client reported that in spanish, he even didn't know what language it was.
and also I don't have title information in the store listing, so I also thought it was automatically generated, not sure only why it was displayed to a customer that doesn't know spanish...
yeah that's very strange, lets ping <@U02094DEMTK> he might know what's going on

Hi everyone can you help me on this :-
I am using same form at two place in same page.
One in top fold and another one in popup but when clicking on popup form submit button it submitting fist fold form not popup form

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/tasks#retrieve-tasks>
Add this `associations=company` to query param to the endpoint as described in the document above
`<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/tasks/{your_task_id}?associations=company>`
